synopsis.text: The OVA tells the story of Rin Azuma, a young Jiang-Shi yokai who has recently moved to the city of Sakurashin. As she adjusts to her new life working at a ramen shop, Rin's peaceful existence is suddenly disrupted by the arrival of her former friend Zakuro Kurumaki. Zakuro has become aligned with a group of dangerous yokai hunters with the goal of capturing Rin and convincing her to help them destroy Sakurashin. The mastermind behind this plot is none other than Enjin Hiizumi, the primary antagonist of the series. When the members of the Hiizumi Life Counseling Office learn of the plan to abduct Rin, they swiftly take action. Not only do they aim to rescue their friend, but they also seek to "tune" the yokai who has taken control of Zakuro's mind. By harnessing their skills and determination, the Hiizumi team hopes to undermine the destructive scheme and protect the city they call home. This OVA promises excitement and intrigue as Rin's new life hangs in the balance. Will the Hiizumi Office succeed in saving their friend and Sakurashin? Or will dark forces prevail?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
